record.dc:title: 25BN12 Eva, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 6BN12 and 6BN13. Infant burial, BN12, in background, disturbed. Adult burial, BN13, beneath and in foreground, flexed on right side, head west. Square 49CA. Direction North.
record.wpa:narrative: [6BN12] Indeterminate child in good condition. Disturbed by intrusion of burial 6BN13. [6BN13] Indeterminate adult in fair condition and fairly complete. Fully flexed, burial on right side, closely flexed, left hand under chin and oriented head to west. Probably pathological. Note small size and large, thick skull (macrocephalic) on right side.
